replies.body: Her broken what? What is shyvana's broken?

Care to give more details than "Tons of Damage"? Because there are shitloads of characters that can do tons of damage. So have you got a specific complaint or did you just keep getting owned by people using Shyvana and are upset about it?

I just feel like when it comes to 1v1's and trades, she hands down beats way more people than a balanced Champion should.

I used to play Shyvana a lot and she's still a popular pick for me and while I understand she has problems sticking to enemies, Chilling smite and Blade of the Ruined King fixed this and made her a mid game monster.

So do a lot of other champs. There are tonnes of champs that dominate in 1v1. Hell any champ can dominate in a 1v1 depending on each players skill. This is a pretty poor complaint since I have used Shyvana myself and due to my skill I can only sometimes 1v1 a player. There was a time though where I was just on a massive roll with her and dominated in the game. It all depends on the player but she is by no means to OP, she can of course be OP and when used with a skilled player on a decent team she can come across as a to OP character. But again there are so so so so many other champs way more OP than her it's just silly to call her out, plus if she was as OP as you say she would get used a lot, but in all the games I have played I have only seen her used a few times. She is a good champ but like I said there are way more champs who do way more damage and way more champs who can own in a 1v1.
